prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Goochland County (Va.) Judgments, 1728-1912. Local government records collection, Goochland County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Goochland County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Goochland County was formed in 1728 from Henrico County.

The Goochland County (Va.) Judgments described in this collection were created by the following courts: County Court, Superior Court of Law, Circuit Superior Court of Law and Chancery, and Circuit Court.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Goochland County (Va.) Judgments, 1728-1912, contain civil cases in which justice was administered on the strictly formulated rules of common law. The majority of cases in this record series relate to matters of debt.

controlaccess.head: Added Entry - Corporate Names:

Goochland County (Va.) Superior Court of Law.
